alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 5:51AM MST until January 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow, moderate at times. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, except 2 to 4 inches on the western slopes of the Bighorn Mountains. Isolated higher amounts near a foot of snow across extreme southern Bighorn Mountains. * WHERE...Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains, and the Bighorn Mountains. * WHEN...Until 11 AM Monday. * IMPACTS...Winter travel conditions are expected, with slick roads and periods of low visibility. Travel may be especially difficult over Powder River Pass, and going through the Wind River Canyon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Backcountry enthusiasts including snowmobilers can easily become disoriented and lost.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains
